description: Yes another simple telegram bot that can manage multiple queues of users.

ADMINS.description: A string of user_chat_id values, separated by commas.

BOT_TOKEN.description: Telegram bot api token. Created by BotFather.

DEV.description: If enabled, you can stop the bot by pressing the Enter key (LOCAL USE ONLY).

LOG_METHOD.description: Log method. Currently only none or stdout.

name: telegram-queue-bot
